title: Kiko the kangaroo: Kiko at the bat = Play ball
creator_credit: Terry Toons, Paul Terry and Mannie Davis
brief_description: It’s the day of the much anticipated ball-game between Kiko’s Australian Champs and the Jungle Giants. The battle begins and the advantage shifts from team to team until fortune smiles upon the Champs and honesty is rewarded with victory.
